name: Kordath
content:
Kordath was a male Talz gladiator living during Galactic War. In 3631 BBY he fought in the Grand Arena on Zakuul alongside Calo Arawan and Veran Anjek against Bowdaar and the Alliance Commander, in a match arranged by Valdos Dofine. Kordath's side lost the fight and all three were killed in the match.
Kordath appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire during Bowdaar Alliance alert mission.
